llm_res.rule: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
The `balanceOf` function must return the actual balance of the account.
The function `decimals` should return the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
Adding non-standard functions and events can lead to confusion and interoperability issues. ERC20 functions and events should adhere to the standard.
